content.description: A great problem with many ways to start. Heel hooks, crimps and a semi-desperate topout make this a great problem.
content.location: On the Diamond side of the river, continue south from Muffin Man(see photos for reference), follow a climbers trail over boulders continuing to hug the hillside and subtle uphill until a small grassy area is reached and you are looking at the super steep Niffelheim boulder. The boulder to the right of that is the prow that has Seasons on it. The most common start is to start matched on the left side and campus or heel hook and then move up the edges trending left in the seam to top-out. The block at the beginning is off.

High in the field, on the way to 'Captain vs. Langston" 

  Boulders in the second large boulder field left of the diamond.Head down the path from the metal fire ring to the creek. Cross the creek on boulders, head left into the boulder field, look for the tall steep arete. Many potential problems starting at the crossing, along the creek, and up over the ridge in the bowl. Lots of stuff has been cleaned, some of it has been climbed or are projects.

content.description: This is problem feels hard until you figure it out! Then you think it might be soft. Until then it might even feel harder than it's neighbor, Seasons in the mist! Climbs through good holds on the arete of Nieflheim. Sit start off a good right jug and a sloping crimp on the left.
content.location: Climbs the arete to the left of the Nieflheim project in the steep overhang

content.description: Head straight up the east face of the boulder, a triangular shaped slab. Enjoy this problem any or all of three different ways: Head up in dry weather as you would any slab, try sprinting up with a running start in street shoes and without using your hands, or climb this one in the rain!
content.protection: Room for pads to cover a hole at the base.
content.location: Park at the outhouse, cross the creek, and head a few steps up the trail trending toward The Diamond, and the Prism Boulder will be right in front of you.

content.description: the stand start version skipping the first dead point off small crimps.

climbs.name: Captain vs Langston
climbs.fa: Nathan Welker, Lang Van Dommelen, Tyler Johnson, Carly Bond

content.description: interesting boulder in a small field high in the boulder field left of the diamond. One boulder sits on top of a white, clean boulder with small crimpers, second boulder makes a roof.
Stand start on holds in the center of the face and make some moves to top out. The sit start from the right is V8.
content.location: Just before niffelhiem as you walk the path.

pathTokens: Archangel Valley Bouldering - Diamond, Fairangel, Monolith, Roadside, Indianhead

content.description: The  boulder field to the left of Toto(from the Circus Boulder to The Muffin Man Boulder). Lots of routes and new potential.
